Question Text: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
Response Text: They should develop an assistant that is beyond just being a tool. They should be humanlike, empathetic, helpful and respectful. The chatbot should be able to understand human nature, not just generally but how humans change on various occasions or need

Question Text: Besides just being accurate, what is the most important thing an AI company could do to help you trust its AI assistant?
Response Text: I think having strong real-world examples of how they acted when things did go wrong or faced issues. Knowing that the humans behind it will step in if something goes very wrong and won't just throw users under the bus would enable trust.
